00024 void Environment::init()
00025 {
00026     predatorCounter = 0;
00027     preyCounter = 0;
00028 }
00029 
00030 const list<string> Environment::getFileNames()
00031 {
00032     list<string> fileNames;
00033 
00034     DIR* directory = opendir(getScriptDirectory().c_str());
00035     if (directory == NULL)
00036         Utils::get()->writeFormattedToLog("Error opening the [%s] Environment's script directory [%s], ignoring.", true, getType().c_str(), getScriptDirectory().c_str());
00037     else
00038     {
00039         dirent* file;
00040         while ((file = readdir(directory)) != NULL)
00041         {
00042             if (file->d_name[0] != '.')
00043                 fileNames.push_back(file->d_name);
00044         }
00045     }
00046 
00047     return fileNames;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void Environment::loadSimulation(const string& file)
00051 {
00052     ReportManager* report = ReportManager::get();
00053 
00054     clearEnvironment();
00055     report->clearReportSections();
00056 
00057     report->createReportSection("environment");
00058     report->getReportSection("environment")->addMessage("Environment created from file: " + getScriptDirectory() + "/" + file);
00059 
00060     ScriptManager::get()->getScriptEngine()->DiscardModule((getScriptDirectory() + file).c_str());
00061     ScriptManager::get()->executeScript((getScriptDirectory() + "/" + file).c_str());
00062 
00063     if (predators.size() > 0)
00064     {
00065         report->getReportSection("environment")->addMessage("Number of Predators: " + Utils::get()->intToString(predators.size()));
00066         report->getReportSection("environment")->addMessage("Number of Prey: " + Utils::get()->intToString(prey.size()));
00067 
00068         SimpleRenderable* background = static_cast<SimpleRenderable*>(SceneManager::get()->getComponent("background"));
00069         background->setSprite(getBackgroundSpriteName());
00070 
00071         SimulationManager::get()->activate();
00072     }
00073     else
00074     {
00075         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Invalid environment.  At least one Predator must exist in a simulation otherwise it could run forever.");
00076         ReportManager::get()->clearReportSections();
00077     }
00078 }

00080 Predator* Environment::createPredator(const string& type, const hgeVector& pos)
00081 {
00082     return createPredator(type, type + Utils::get()->intToString(predatorCounter++), pos);
00083 }
00084 
00085 void Environment::killPredator(const string& name)
00086 {
00087     if (predators.find(name) != predators.end())
00088     {
00089         SimulationManager::get()->getPredatorManager()->predatorStarved(predators.begin()->second);
00090         killPredator(predators[name]);
00091     }
00092     else
00093         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Predator with name [" + name + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Environment::killPredator(Predator* animal)
00097 {
00098     predators.erase(animal->getName());
00099     delete animal;
00100 }
00101 
00102 Prey* Environment::createPrey(const string& type, const hgeVector& pos)
00103 {
00104     return createPrey(type, type + Utils::get()->intToString(preyCounter++), pos);
00105 }
00106 
00107 void Environment::killPrey(const string& name)
00108 {
00109     if (prey.find(name) != prey.end())
00110     {
00111         SimulationManager::get()->getPredatorManager()->removePrey(prey.begin()->second);
00112         killPrey(prey[name]);
00113     }
00114     else
00115         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Prey with name [" + name + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Environment::killPrey(Prey* animal)
00119 {
00120     prey.erase(animal->getName());
00121     delete animal;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void Environment::clearEnvironment()
00125 {
00126     while (predators.size() > 0)
00127     {
00128         killPredator(predators.begin()->second);
00129         SimulationManager::get()->getPredatorManager()->flushPredators();
00130     }
00131 
00132     while (prey.size() > 0)
00133     {
00134         SimulationManager::get()->getPredatorManager()->removePrey(prey.begin()->second);
00135         killPrey(prey.begin()->second);
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void Environment::update()
00140 {
00141     if (predators.size() == 0 && SimulationManager::get()->isActive())
00142     {
00143         ReportManager::get()->getReportSection("environment")->addMessage("Simulation terminated at: " + SimulationManager::get()->getSimulationTime());
00144         ReportManager::get()->writeReport();
00145         SimulationManager::get()->deactivate();
00146     }
00147 }
